# Design

  • Invision — Prototyping, collaboration & workflow platform.

  • Coolors — Generate infinite color palettes for your designs and share, export or save it in your profile.

  • Beetle Blocks — Visual code for 3d design.

  • Design Language — IBM's shared vocabulary for design.

  • Vikalp Design — Great project that designs cultural communication symbols.

  • Gist Deck — Hosting Remark presentations on Github 'gists'.

  • impress.js — Presentation framework based on the power of CSS3 transforms and transitions.

  • Placeit — Free product mockups & templates.

  • Best Pitch Decks — Good pitch deck resources and examples.

  • PSDTUTS — Free tutorials in design and illustration, 3D, motion graphics, photography, and audio.

  • GIMP — GNU Image Manipulation Program. Graphics software for photo retouching, image composition and image authoring.

  • Inkscape — Open-source scalable vector graphics editor (similar to Adobe Illustrator).

  • Microsoft Inclusive Design — Microsoft's very good center that has a lot of great resources for designing with inclusion in mind from the beginning.
